verses.verse: Efrayim <S%H669><s%> feedeth <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on wind <S%H7307><s%>, and followeth <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after the east wind <S%H6921><s%>: he daily <S%H3117><s%> increaseht <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> and desolation <S%H7701><s%>; and they do make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the Ashurns <S%H804><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%> is carried <S%H2986><s%> <S%H8714><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath also a controversy <S%H7379><s%> with Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and will punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> according to his ways <S%H1870><s%>; according to his doings <S%H4611><s%> will he recompense <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him.
He took his brother <S%H251><s%> by the heel <S%H6117><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the womb <S%H990><s%>, and by his strength <S%H202><s%> he had power <S%H8280><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

Yea, he had power <S%H7786><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over the angel <S%H4397><s%>, and prevailed <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: he wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and made supplication <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto him: he found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, and there he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with us;
Havahn the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; the YY <S%H3068><s%> is his memorial <S%H2143><s%>.

Therefore turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou to thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and wait <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8761><s%> on thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
He is a merchant <S%H3667><s%>, the balances <S%H3976><s%> of deceit <S%H4820><s%> are in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: he loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to oppress <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And Efrayim <S%H669><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Yet I am become rich <S%H6238><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I have found me out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> substance <S%H202><s%>: in all my labours <S%H3018><s%> they shall find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> none iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in me that were sin <S%H2399><s%>.

And I that am the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will yet make thee to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in tabernacles <S%H168><s%>, as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of the solemn feast <S%H4150><s%>.

I have also spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> by the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and I have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%>, and used similitudes <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, by the ministry <S%H3027><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%>.

Is there iniquity <S%H205><s%> in Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>? surely they are vanity <S%H7723><s%>: they sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8765><s%> bullocks <S%H7794><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; yea, their altars <S%H4196><s%> are as heaps <S%H1530><s%> in the furrows <S%H8525><s%> of the fields <S%H7704><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the country <S%H7704><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%>, and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a wife <S%H802><s%>, and for a wife <S%H802><s%> he kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> sheep.

And by a prophet <S%H5030><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and by a prophet <S%H5030><s%> was he preserved <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Efrayim <S%H669><s%> provoked him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8689><s%> most bitterly <S%H8563><s%>: therefore shall he leave <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> upon him, and his reproach <S%H2781><s%> shall his YY <S%H113><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto him.
